notes: [[Werewolf]]'s boss. Part of the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest]].
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|?}}|{{Ability|Red musical wave|unknown effect|element=?}}|{{Ability|Summons 2 [[War Wolf|War Wolves]] at once|white musical bomb around itself|element=summon}}|{{Healing|range=10-125?}}|{{Haste}}|{{Ability|and possibly more|element=?}} }}
name: Hemming
location: [[Vengoth/Werewolf Cave|Vengoth Werewolf Cave]], behind the teleport which is located {{Mapper Coords|128.224|122.211|7|2|text=here}}.
strategy:
'''[[Paladin]]s and [[Mage]]s''': Run him around the room while shooting [[Assassin Star]]s/[[Prismatic Bolt]]s/[[SD]]s. If he uses [[Haste]], you may need to do the same to keep distance. Make sure to use [[Exura]] or [[Exura Gran]] if he catches up to you.
'''[[Knight]]s''': Shoot a [[Fire Bomb]] onto the floor somewhere, then attack '''Hemming''' and move into the middle of the fire bomb. '''Hemming''' will come after you onto the fire, but his [[War Wolf|War Wolves]] will not. Thus you will avoid having your shielding broken and will take considerably less [[melee]] damage. '''Note:''' Do not bother killing the [[War Wolf|War Wolves]] as they will most likely be summoned again very quickly.
